did.head: Overview of the Collection

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Alfred R. Armstrong Papers, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center from Gift of Alfred R. Armstrong. on 02/15/1984.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: A portion of this collection was previously part of the University Archives Faculty-Alumni File Collection. It was rehoused here 11/11/09.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Further description added by Mindy Gipson, SCRC Staff, in November 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Alfred Ringold Armstrong was a student (1928-1934) and later a faculty member at the College of William and Mary. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Alfred R. Armstrong

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of three notebooks containing lecture notes taken by Alfred R. Armstrong in Roscoe C. Young's advanced physics classes, 1932-1933, at the College of William and Mary.This collection also includes several report cards for Alfred R. Armstrong, 1928-1931, accompanied by his comments regarding the grading process and his professors, transferred from the Faculty-Alumni File Collection.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
